name: Pixwars: Space Impact
description:
Hello soldier! Our Pixel Universe PX-31W is at war.  Cthulhu's fleet is on the way through a worm hole. Your mission is to stop Cthulhu and it' dark army from infiltrating our universe. Good luck soldier!

Credits:

  • Libgdx Community: https://discord.gg/9X4MMfH
  • (Playtest) Erwin Mano
  • (Balance Gameplay) JGRAN Omino

Sound Credits:

  • 8-bit bgm: On My Way [8 Bit Loop] | OpenGameArt.org
  • 8-bit sfx: 8 Bit Sound Effects | OpenGameArt.org

Assets:

  • Download assets here for free: https://rondeo.itch.io/pixwars-space-impact-assets
